subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Simona Halep defeated Timea Babos, 6-4, 6-0, in second-round play in the Guangzhou International Women’s Open in China.
snippet: Top-seeded Simona Halep defeated Timea Babos, 6-4, 6-0, in second-round play in the Guangzhou International Women’s Open in China.
